column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: interest. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```turtle@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix interestOntology: <http://www.example.org/interestOntology#> .#Defining ClassesinterestOntology:Interest   rdf:type rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:label "Interest" ;  rdfs:comment "A class to denote interest in a particular subject" .interestOntology:Subject   rdf:type rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:label "Subject" ;  rdfs:comment "A class to denote a particular subject of interest" .#Defining PropertiesinterestOntology:hasInterest   rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:label "has interest" ;  rdfs:comment "A property that links an individual to an interest" ;  rdfs:domain interestOntology:Individual ;  rdfs:range interestOntology:Interest .interestOntology:relatedToSubject  rdf:type rdf:Property ;  rdfs:label "related to subject" ;  rdfs:comment "A property that links an interest to a particular subject" ;  rdfs:domain interestOntology:Interest ;  rdfs:range interestOntology:Subject .#Creating InstancesinterestOntology:mathInterest   rdf:type interestOntology:Interest ;  rdfs:label "Interest in Mathematics" .interestOntology:mathSubject  rdf:type interestOntology:Subject ;  rdfs:label "Mathematics" ;  rdfs:comment "The subject of Mathematics" .#Linking InstancesinterestOntology:mathInterest  interestOntology:relatedToSubject interestOntology:mathSubject .```
